entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
